name: bornReady
0:
”Alexa, open born ready”
”Alexa, ask born ready to give me a tip”
”Alexa, give me a tip from born ready”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: born ready
des:
Your child was born ready to learn and you were born ready to teach them, but a little help never hurt! That’s why Born Ready has partnered with Vroom.org to provide you with tips, created by industry leading experts, to help you teach your little ones.

These free, fast and fun tips correlate with key functions of early brain development, including Chat, Follow, Look, Stretch, and Take Turns. Whether it’s playtime, bathtime, bedtime or just downtime, there are tons of great tips you can try right in your own home. 

Born Ready is a movement by the Alabama Department of Early Childhood Education (ADECE) focused on raising awareness among Alabama parents of the importance of early brain development and high quality early care and education. 

To start, just say "Alexa, give me a tip from born ready" or "Alexa, open born ready" to get a tip.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".

Currently supported languages: English
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
